projectGridLines.title: Research & Development, Proposal Writing
projectGridLines.description:
Description: Research, program design and proposal writing in the social impact areas of education, skill development, health of underprivileged, environment, disability and inclusion, tribal welfare etc.,

Perform R & D activities on Skills projects, Environmental Projects, Education projects & Health projects. For the projects, understand needs through need assessment. If required need to interact with the related stakeholders, and pay visits. Work on analysis and impact assessments.

Based on organizational requirements. Need to write a proposal for corporate partners.
